name: Anthrax
information: Anthrax is a serious infectious disease caused by gram-positive, rod-shaped bacteria known as Bacillus anthracis. It can affect both humans and animals, particularly cattle, sheep, and goats.
remedies: Vaccination of other animals in the herd

causes.main: Infection by Bacillus anthracis bacteria, usually through ingestion of contaminated soil, plants, or water
specific_causes: Contact with contaminated soil containing anthrax spores

prevention: Avoid grazing in known infected areas
Quick reporting of suspicious deaths to authorities
